content.text:
[@mix](@ye+QM09iPcDJD6YvQYjoQc7sLF/IFhmNbEqgdzQo3lQ=.ed25519) 

Yep, it tracks `master` from GitHub so it should have everything. I didn't know about `/calendar`, it's not showing in the menu for me but I can browse to it manually. Looks great!

By the way, is GitHub the best place to discuss Patchbay? I had a few questions for packaging but wasn't sure whether to post on GitHub ([#212](https://github.com/ssbc/patchbay/issues/212) and [#213](https://github.com/ssbc/patchbay/issues/213)), ssb-git, here, or maybe smoke signals.
